OtherComments.Content: Superscript This script creates superscripts by scaling the figures and applying a bold transformation. You may need to adjust the values of the bold transformation to suit the weight of your font.

Superscript Width Remove the next line for fonts with uneven figure width. Calculate the uniform width as follows: Width = figure width x hirozontal scale/100 + (2 x horizontal bold), e.g. 899 = 1303 x 65/100 + 52
Vertical Alignment The tops of superscripts are designed to align with the tops of figures. Adjust the vertical position by changing the value of the Move transformation.
